Structs/TopologyDescription.html#/s:10Mo.name: maxSetVersion
Structs/TopologyDescription.html#/s:10Mo.abstract: The largest setVersion ever reported by a primary.

Structs/TopologyDescription.html#/s:10Mo.abstract: The largest electionId ever reported by a primary.

Structs/TopologyDescription.html#/s:10Mo.name: servers
Structs/TopologyDescription.html#/s:10Mo.abstract: The servers comprising this topology. By default, a single server at localhost:270107.

Structs/TopologyDescription.html#/s:10Mo.name: stale
Structs/TopologyDescription.html#/s:10Mo.abstract: For single-threaded clients, indicates whether the topology must be re-scanned.

Structs/TopologyDescription.html#/s:10Mo.name: compatibilityError
Structs/TopologyDescription.html#/s:10Mo.abstract: Exists if any server’s wire protocol version range is incompatible with the client’s.

Structs/TopologyDescription.html#/s:10Mo.name: logicalSessionTimeoutMinutes
Structs/TopologyDescription.html#/s:10Mo.abstract: The logicalSessionTimeoutMinutes value for this topology. This value is the minimum

Structs/TopologyDescription.html#/s:10Mo.name: hasReadableServer()
Structs/TopologyDescription.html#/s:10Mo.abstract: Returns true if the topology has a readable server available, and false otherwise.

Structs/TopologyDescription.html#/s:10Mo.name: hasWritableServer()
Structs/TopologyDescription.html#/s:10Mo.abstract: Returns true if the topology has a writable server available, and false otherwise.

Structs/ServerDescription.html#/s:10Mong.name: connectionId
Structs/ServerDescription.html#/s:10Mong.abstract: The hostname or IP and the port number that the client connects to. Note that this is not the

Structs/ServerDescription.html#/s:10Mong.name: error
Structs/ServerDescription.html#/s:10Mong.abstract: The last error related to this server.

Structs/ServerDescription.html#/s:10Mong.name: roundTripTime
Structs/ServerDescription.html#/s:10Mong.abstract: The duration of the server’s last ismaster call.

Structs/ServerDescription.html#/s:10Mong.name: lastWriteDate
Structs/ServerDescription.html#/s:10Mong.abstract: The lastWriteDate from the server’s most recent ismaster response.

Structs/ServerDescription.html#/s:10Mong.name: opTime
Structs/ServerDescription.html#/s:10Mong.abstract: The last opTime reported by the server. Only mongos and shard servers

Structs/ServerDescription.html#/s:10Mong.abstract: The minimum wire protocol version supported by the server.

Structs/ServerDescription.html#/s:10Mong.name: maxWireVersion
Structs/ServerDescription.html#/s:10Mong.abstract: The maximum wire protocol version supported by the server.

Structs/ServerDescription.html#/s:10Mong.name: me
Structs/ServerDescription.html#/s:10Mong.abstract: The hostname or IP and the port number that this server was configured with in the replica set.

Structs/ServerDescription.html#/s:10Mong.name: hosts
Structs/ServerDescription.html#/s:10Mong.abstract: This server’s opinion of the replica set’s hosts, if any.

Structs/ServerDescription.html#/s:10Mong.name: arbiters
Structs/ServerDescription.html#/s:10Mong.abstract: This server’s opinion of the replica set’s arbiters, if any.

Structs/ServerDescription.html#/s:10Mong.name: passives
Structs/ServerDescription.html#/s:10Mong.abstract: Passives are priority-zero replica set members that cannot become primary.

Structs/ServerDescription.html#/s:10Mong.name: electionId
Structs/ServerDescription.html#/s:10Mong.abstract: The election ID where this server was elected, if this is a replica set member that believes it is primary.

Structs/ServerDescription.html#/s:10Mong.name: primary
Structs/ServerDescription.html#/s:10Mong.abstract: This server’s opinion of who the primary is.

Structs/ConnectionId.html#/s:10MongoSwif.name: host
Structs/ConnectionId.html#/s:10MongoSwif.abstract: A string representing the host for this connection.
ConnectionIds are equal if their hosts and ports match.
